definition: of or relating to futurism, someone who predicts the future
details:
adjective
- of or relating to futurism
= example: of or relating to futurism
= synonyms: futuristic
noun
- someone who predicts the future
= synonyms: fantast
- a theologian who believes that the Scripture prophecies of the Apocalypse (the Book of Revelation) will be fulfilled in the future
